name: emiT (Icklebognok)
description:
Ever since you found that gem, time has been at your mercy. Coal crates you could barely push on your own now move like you've been pushing them for a thousand years. You can reach new heights by rewinding the time when you fell, which has yet to happen.  Be wary though, no matter which end of the candle you burn, you will run out of fuel.

So go little furnace bot, break free of this factory... But then again, you already have...

EMIT GAMEPLAY

So from what i've seen, there's 10 levels to this factory. Each having varying degrees of difficulty. You'll have to manipulate time to move objects, freeze objects, and pull yourself around try your damnedest to stay alive. I've heard that there's a custom basement where they setup basic set ups to use, should the factory need expanding...

Credits:

Joshua Shepherd - Character Designer, Concept Designer, Programmer,  Level designer.

Thomas Fryer - Environmental Artist
